verbose_text: That is to say the pure RFP synthesized by fat body account for about 1.6% of single transgenic silkworm / pupae, suggesting the potential utility of the Bmlp3 promoter for production of recombinant proteins in the fat body of transgenic silkworm.
evidence: RFP synthesized by fat body account for about 1.6 % of single transgenic silkworm/pupae, suggesting the potential utility of the Bmlp3 promoter
